chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_124
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
pain 
Vaginal discharge 
with or without 
odour
RTI/STI Refer the woman to the MO. Advise her 
on vaginal hygiene, i.e., cleaning the 
external genitalia with soap and water.
Leaking of watery fluids P/V. Wet pads/cloths Premature 
Rupture of 
Membrane 
(PROM)
 ∙ Refer the woman to the MO at FRU
 ∙ Eyes roll
 ∙ Face and limbs twitch
 ∙ Body gets stiff and shakes
 ∙ Fists clinched 
Convulsions/
Fits
 ∙ Refer the woman to the MO at FRU
 ∙ Skin rashes with Itching
 ∙ Presence of pus-filled boils
